name: I go to a product detail and click Wishlist and Share buttons, I should see this product in the my wishlist and Share button has a reaction -- @1.2

fullName: As a user I want to add a product to my wishlist and share a product by using detail wishlist and share buttons: I go to a product detail and click Wishlist and Share buttons, I should see this product in the my wishlist and Share button has a reaction
